document_data.name: Chloracridara
document_data.home: [[Mhiilamniir]], [[High Forest]]{{Cite dragon/233/Wyrms of the North: Claugiyliamatar|37}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''Chloracridara'''<ref group="note">''[[Demihuman Deities]]'', on page 119, instead names the dragon Choloracridara. was an old female [[green dragon]] who lived in the partially standing temple to [[Corellon Larethian]] in the ruined [[Eaerlann]]i settlement of [[Mhiilamniir]]. She had lived there for more than six hundred years by [[1372 DR]].

Rabidly paranoid, Chloracridara claimed the whole city and its environs as her domain, making it too hazardous for elven pilgrims to visit any of the temples.
